about.title: About me
about.content: My name is Sofiane Rahmani, with a background as an expert in medical management software. Today, as a self-taught frontend web developer, I specialize in creating modern and efficient web applications. Passionate about innovation and always eager to learn, I am committed to delivering high-quality web solutions to meet the specific needs of each project. Discover how I can turn your ideas into impressive digital realities.
